name: Christmas Sweeper
description:
Christmas Sweeper

This is a great guessing game for kids and just in time for the holidays.

Tap on the ornaments to try to find the Christmas Present with as little moves as possible!

Each level has only a certain amount of moves and gets harder the further you get in the game.

There is only 13 levels but challenge yourself and your friends to see if you can complete level 13!

When you click the ornament, you may find Rudolph the reindeer, but be cautious as to find the Christmas Present with little moves as possible.

When you click the ornament and find a Christmas tree, that means you're getting close but pick wisely as with every tap, your number of attempts will diminish before you know it.

Enjoy!

Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!!
